caption.p: ( a) Cyclic voltammograms of Ph 3COMgCl- (blue), Ph 3SiOMgCl- (red), and B(OMgCl) 3-based (green) electrolytes at the 100 th cycle. Measurements were taken at a scan rate of 5 mV/s at 20 °C using Pt, Mg, and Mg as the working, reference, and counter electrodes, respectively, in a three-electrode cell. ( b) Linear sweep voltammograms of Ph 3COMgCl- (blue), Ph 3SiOMgCl- (red), and B(OMgCl) 3-based (green) electrolytes at a scan rate of 5 mV/s at 20 °C. ( c) Cyclic voltammograms at the 100 th cycle measured at a scan rate of 5 mV/s at 20 °C. The blue and red curves represent the first measurement and measurement after three weeks, respectively, for the Ph 3COMgCl-based electrolyte. The green and purple curves represent the first measurement and measurement after three weeks, respectively, for the Ph 3SiOMgCl-based electrolyte. ( d) 1H NMR spectra of the Ph 3COMgCl-based electrolyte as prepared (blue) and three weeks after preparation (red) and Ph 3SiOMgCl-based electrolyte as prepared (green) and three weeks after preparation (purple).
